Recipe By : Elizabeth Powell Place bluefish fillets in a shallow ceramic or enameled baking dish. Combine vinegar, onions, peppercorns, and allspice. Pour over fillet, turning to coat. Marinate, skin side up, at room temperature, for 1 hour. Pour off vinegar, but not onions or spices. Turn skin side down and spread top with sour cream. Bake at 350 degrees for 20-25 minutes, until fish flakes easily with a fork.
